titleStmt.title: Gorgias Press Announces Over 100 New Reprints

analytic.author: Gorgias Press LLC
analytic.title: Gorgias Press Announces Over 100 New Reprints

projectDesc.p: Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies is an electronic journal dedicated to the study of the Syriac tradition, published semi-annually (in January and July) by Beth Mardutho: The Syriac Institute. Published since 1998, Hugoye seeks to offer the best scholarship available in the field of Syriac studies.

revisionDesc.change: File created by XSLT transformation of original HTML encoded article.

body.p: [1] Gorgias Press is offering a 15-30% pre-publication discount on new reprints of rare books on Syriac studies and other fields. A small limited number of copies of each title is available at the reduced price. Please reserve your copy now.
[2] For a complete catalogue, visit www.gorgiaspress.com, or write to Gorgias Press, 46 Orris Ave., Piscataway, NJ 08854, Tel. 732-699-0343, Fax. 732-699-0342, E-mail: info@gorgiaspress.com.
